item.title: Game Analysis: Zara (Bot 750)
item.description: Score sheet d4 b5 Bf4 e5 Bxe5 Ba6 Nf3 h5 e3 Rh6 Bf4 Be7 Bxh6 gxh6 Bd3 Kf8 O-O Bb4 c3 Ba5 b4 h4 bxa5 Ke8 Ne5 Ne7 Qh5 Qc8 Nxf7 Nbc6 Nd6+ Kd8 Qe8# Analysis d4 White intends the London system. …b5 Black uses the Polish defence. Bf4 Dark squared Bishop is developed as per the London system. … e5 Black hangs the King’s pawn. It’s attacked twice but is undefended.
